scripts.build: astro check && astro build && npx pagefind --site dist && pwsh -Command "if (Test-Path dist/_pagefind) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist/_pagefind }; Move-Item -Path dist/pagefind -Destination dist/_pagefind -Force; if (Test-Path public/_pagefind) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force public/_pagefind }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path public/_pagefind -Force | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Recurse dist/_pagefind/* public/_pagefind/"
